author: The Quaker Oats Company
title: PB&J Smoothie
ingredients: 2 tbsp peanut butter (or almond butter, if preferred)
1/2 cup frozen strawberries (or frozen berries of your choice)
1 cup almond milk (or any milk of your choice)
instructions_list: Soak the oats in almond milk for 10 minutes to soften them. Alternatively, you can use them dry for more texture.
Add the oats, peanut butter, strawberries, banana, almond milk, Greek yogurt (if using), desired sweetener and vanilla to a personal or large blender.
Pour the smoothie into a large glass and enjoy! You can top it with a few extra berries, a drizzle of peanut butter, or a sprinkle of oats for some extra flair.
description: Discover a fun and delicious way to enjoy oats with our easy and delicious PB&J Smoothie recipe made with your favorite Quaker® products.
